scripts.test-integration: npx newman run ./tests/integration/airbnb-listings/api_v2.json -e ./tests/integration/airbnb-listings/environments/local_v2.json && npx newman run ./tests/integration/global-food-prices/GLOBAL-FOOD-PRICES-API-LOCAL.postman_collection.json -e ./tests/integration/global-food-prices/environments/sos.postman_environment.json && npx newman run ./tests/integration/world-consumption-of-drinking-water-data/apijota.json -e ./tests/integration/world-consumption-of-drinking-water-data/environments/local.json
scripts.test: npm run test-integration && npm run test-e2e
scripts.posttest: kill `ps -uax | grep "node index" | grep -v "grep" | grep -v "sh" | awk '{print $2}'`
